name: Bad Chicken (itch)
description:
✨Wishlist on Steam!✨ STORY

The inhabitants of planet Terraferus have detected a hostile alien force at the edge of the Ferus system. Terraferus military forces had been sent to confront it, but have returned as brainwashed puppets of the aliens. With the initial forces brainwashed it is up to the Bad Chicken mercenary team to protect the Ferus system and take down the hostile menace.

DESCRIPTION

Bad Chicken is a retro styled sideway scrolling shmup inspired by retro classics like Gradius. It takes place in 8 locations in the Ferus system, each one with different challenges, and dangers. The difficulty has been carefully handcrafted to provide a fair challenge, and each location is deadlier than the last.

FEATURES
  • Pixel Art graphics.
  • 8 Levels each with a Boss fight.
  • Multiple mini-boss fights.
  • Vehicles
DEFAULT INPUT
  • Move/Select ---> Arrow Keys or Left joystick.
  • Shoot/Accept ---> 'Q' or Down face button on gamepad.
  • Bombs/Cancel ---> 'W' or Right face button on gamepad.
  • Pause ---> 'E' or Start button on gamepad.
